monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: The Critical Chance and Critical Damage of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 2.5% continuously.  (For a 4 hit attack it is +0%, +2.5%, +5%, +7.5%)

skills.name: Anti Cascade
skills.description: Reduces enemy damage by 3% for every consecutive hit. (1st hit: 0% reduction, 2nd hit: 3% reduction, 3rd hit: 6% reduction)

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Attack Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Attack value.

skills.name: Auto Heal
skills.description: When attacking, also heal the Monster with the lowest health in the party by 200% of Magic.

skills.name: Bite
skills.description: 2 x 170% (340%) physical damage (neutral) heal self for 2 x (50 + 40% Attack)

skills.name: Bite Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 130% (390%) physical damage (neutral) heal self for 3 x (50 + 30% Attack)

skills.name: Bite Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 125% (500%) physical damage (neutral) heal self for 4 x (75 + 25% Attack)

skills.name: Carnage
skills.description: 2 x 165% (330%) physical damage (neutral) Hits all enemies - Heal all allies for (500 + 150% Attack)

skills.name: Claws
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 130% (390%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Claws Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 120% (480%) physical damage (neutral) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Combo Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 30% of Magic value.

skills.name: Concealed
skills.description: During its first round, this Monster has an additional 25% chance to dodge enemy hits.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Apex
skills.description: The Critical Chance and Critical Damage of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 2.5% continuously.  (For a 4 hit attack it is +0%, +2.5%, +5%, +7.5%)

skills.name: Critical Boon
skills.description: On Critical Hit, 50% chance to grant a random Buff to another random Monster in the party.

skills.name: Critical Healing
skills.description: Healing actions can land a "Critical Heal" to heal for an increased amount, based on Critical Chance and Critical Damage. (Triggering any Crit-based skills)

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Critical Mass
skills.description: 50% chance to gain a random Buff when landing a Critical Hit.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 37)

skills.name: Earth Resistance
skills.description: Earth damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Empower
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party deal 5% more damage.

skills.name: Evasion
skills.description: Critical Chance also increases the chance to dodge enemy hits by 20% of the value.

skills.name: Full Heal
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (200 + 40% Magic) Applies Glory, Barrier, Channel & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration, Sidekick & Glory (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Utility Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Channel, Regeneration, Sidekick, Glory & Barrier (Buffs)

skills.name: Gift of Life
skills.description: Revives all allies Heal all for 3 x (400 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Glory
skills.description: Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Heal
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (60 + 20% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Charging
skills.description: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (85 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (100 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (130 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Link
skills.description: Whenever another Monster in your party is healed, this Monster has a 25% chance to get healed by the same amount.

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Healing Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (250 + 80% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (200 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 3 x (200 + 40% Magic)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Helping Hand
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (110 + 50% Magic) Applies Sidekick (Buff)

skills.name: Helping Hand Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (150 + 55% Magic) Applies Sidekick & Regeneration (Buffs)

skills.name: Hybrid Shield
skills.description: At the start of combat, apply a Shield equal to 100% of Attack and Magic value.

skills.name: Improved Glory
skills.description: Unique Aura: Glory (Buff) increases Critical damage by an additional 20%.

skills.name: Lifesteal
skills.description: Heal by 15% of the damage dealt to enemies.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magic Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 35% of Magic value.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 11)

skills.name: Mana Upkeep
skills.description: Aura: Increases Mana Regeneration of the whole party by 10%.

skills.name: Maneki
skills.description: Critical Hits have a 30% chance to grant Glory to a random ally. This monster can apply Glory an additional time.

skills.name: Mass Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 15% less damage from Multi-Target-Attacks.

skills.name: Mentor
skills.description: Whenever this Monster uses a single-target skill on an ally, they gain 2 random Buffs.

skills.name: Power Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Restore
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (50 + 20% Magic) Removes 1 Debuff

skills.name: Restore Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (60 + 25% Magic) Removes 2 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (100 + 25% Magic) Removes 3 Debuffs

skills.name: Restore Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (120 + 25% Magic) Removes 4 Debuffs

skills.name: Revive
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 5 x (50 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 2
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (75 + 15% Magic)

skills.name: Revive Lvl 3
skills.description: Revives target Heal target for 6 x (125 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Riot
skills.description: Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party Applies Might (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Riot Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Glory (Buff) to whole party Applies Might (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Riot Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Glory & Might (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Water Weakness
skills.description: Water damage increased by 50%
